duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast, friendly service to customers. Take care of the food program and set an example for the staff.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire, delegate and follow-up, and teach and motivate others.
Plan and organize tasks, communicate plans and ideas, handle cash and bookkeeping, and solve problems.
Advocate and empathize, and ensure safety and security standards are met.
Maintain customer satisfaction, facility condition, merchandising, sales controls, financial controls, staffing controls, security controls, and administrative controls.
Prepare or assist in preparing periodic sales, product, and operating reports, and attend job-related meetings.
Perform all duties with minimal supervision, and complete daily store reports and other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
